name: Unread Mentions Counter
author: ArgoWizbang
description:
Adds an unread mentions/pings counter in the inactive browser tab of stream chats.

Be able to see if anyone has mentioned/pinged you in chat while you were viewing a different tab in your browser!

name: Twir
author: crashmax
description: Adds command suggestions and badges from Twir.

name: Trubbelâ€™s Utilities
description: Just some random things.
author: Trubbel

name: TheHitless Badges
author: Wolfang
description: Add TheHitless Badges to twitch chat

name: Run Streamerbot Action
author: Patch Does
description: Run an action in Streamerbot with a chat action!

name: Smokey's Utilities
author: Smokey
description: Stuff to make a better Twitch.

name: SMM2 Links
author: SirStendec
description: This add-on turns Super Mario Maker 2 course and maker IDs in chat into clickable links.

name: Screenshotter
author: CJMAXiK
description: Allows you to take screenshots of the player using a button/shortcut.

name: Chat Repetition Detector
author: yannismate
description: This add-on marks repeated messages from the same user for moderation purposes.

name: Ragnarok Online Database
author: Wizzzzard
description: This plugin enables the pulling of data from the divine-pride.net database and displaying it in the chat when a link is provided.

name: Pronouns
author: Alejo Pereyra
description:
Add Pronouns to Chat

Include Pronouns as a chat badge next to user's names in Chat!

To set your own pronouns, visit https://pronouns.alejo.io/

name: PrattleNot
author: SirStendec
description:
**Note**: This extension is currently hard to configure, has several limitations in configuration, and may be buggy. However, the basic concept works and people have been asking for it again.

PrattleNot adds additional chat filters that can be configured to remove spammy messages in chat. This is more useful for larger, spammier chats than small chats.

name: Poll Shim
author: SirStendec
description: This module connects with software running on your computer to automatically run polls on Twitch, in lieu of an official API from Twitch.

name: No Bad Emotes
author: SirStendec
description: This add-on removes undesired emotes from chat, so you only see the words. Tired of people using replacing stupidly common words like 'the' with emotes using platforms without any sort of common sense restrictions? Just grab this.

name: New Account Highlighter
author: 0x
description: Highlights new user accounts in chat

name: Modchecker
author: MrPandir
description: Adds Modchecker Badges into the Twitch Chat

name: Mass Moderation Utilities
author: ArgoWizbang
description:
A tool for mass banning/unbanning users or blocking terms/phrases via mod view in channels that you moderate or own.

The button to open the tool can be found in the mod dock on the bottom left section of the mod view page.

name: Inline Tab-Completion
author: SirStendec
description:
Adds support for inline tab-completion to chat. Meaning, tab-completion without a popup.

Certain settings from [Chat > Input >> Tab Completion](~chat.input.tab_completion) may not function while this add-on is enabled. This add-on is designed to mimic the tab-completion behavior of BetterTTV.

name: Fullscreen Chat
author: SirStendec
description: Adds a button to the player for displaying chat as an overlay on the player when in fullscreen mode. Please forgive my programmer art icon.

name: First Message Highlight
author: deko_ration
description: Addon to highlight the first message of a user during the current session. Useful for community-driven chats and welcoming.

name: LirikLIVE
author: Lordmau5
description: The LirikLIVE extension!

name: The FrankerFaceZ Add-On Pack - Core
author: Lordmau5
description: This is the core functionality for The FrankerFaceZ Add-On Pack. It includes FFZ:AP supporter functionality and various other required utilities for the FFZ:AP modules.

name: BetterTTV Emotes
author: Lordmau5
description: Adds BetterTTV Global Emotes, Channel Emotes and Pro functionality (badges and emotes).

name: Emote Less Chat
author: EchtkPvL
description: This addon removes every chat message, that only contains emotes.

name: Emote Side Panel
author: amartini
description: Declutter the chat by sending emote-only messages to a side panel.

name: Declutterer
author: ae9is
description: Removes some repetitive messages to help slow down your chat.

name: Deck
author: SirStendec
description:
Deck provides a TweetDeck-like experience for finding content on Twitch.

You can define columns for live channels, videos, or clips. Sort each column how you want. Filter by tags. Find the content you want to watch.

This extension is not super user-friendly for getting started, but I don't have the time to give it the polish it deserves.

name: Clips Manager Fullscreen Button
author: ArgoWizbang
description: Adds a button to enable fullscreen mode to the video player on the Clips Manager page in the Creator Dashboard.

name: Clip Confirm
author: ArgoWizbang
description: Adds a confirmation prompt (with optional manual bypass) when the Clip button is clicked.

name: Chatterino Homies
author: RETRORELAXO
description: Adds Chatterino Homies Badges into the Twitch Chat

name: Chatterino Badges
author: Verotek
description: Adds Chatterino Badges to your Chat Box.

name: Better Right Click Menu
author: L3afMe
description: Adds a better right click menu.

name: Better minecraft badge
author: MrPandir
description: Replace the Minecraft badge for the 15th anniversary with a more beautiful one

name: Aplatypuss
author: nznaza
description: This is adds custom emotes and badges to Aplatypuss chat

name: Mod Tools
author: Greger
description: Adds new actions for making modding easier

name: 7TV Emotes
author: Melonify
description: Adds 7TV Channel, Global & Personal Emotes, Badges, and User Cosmetics.
